articles.content:

articles.title: England Lioness Jill Scott works at her coffee shop after Euros glory with her winner's medal - Daily Mail
articles.description: Jill Scott MBE was pictured in her coffee shop in Manchester serving coffee and toasties to customers and fans just five days after the Lionesses Euros victory.
articles.content:
England Lioness Jill Scott MBE has returned to reality by working a shift at her coffee shop, Boxx2Boxx, after playing a part in England's triumphant 2-1 Euros victory over Germany.
